title: hacked account
body:
I was hacked recently by some one who sent me a link for a free ekko skin, (the sand one) and the next thing I know my password wont work and i have forgotten what email I used, How do I go about this?
I can not fill out the support (submit a request) because I do not remember a couple of the details..
I am using a mates account (this account) so I can put this up... 
If you are reading this Riot staff/support service please reset my password!!!

replies.body:
You can initiate a password reset with [this link](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/oce/en/forgot-password) using your account name (the one you login with).

If you still have issues accessing your account, you'll have to do your best at providing enough information with your [support ticket request.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) 

I also wanted to mention that using anyone else's account, even just to post on the boards is against the [terms of use](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse) and not a good idea for account security. Let me know if you have any questions.
